entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
